Matplotlib saving best practices:

  • bbox_inches = tight
  • transparent=True
  • dpi=300 or dpi=600 for .png

…more to be added.

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.
